title: Security & Emergency
subtitle: Campus emergency resources, contacts, and guidance.
alertText: Stay calm during emergencies. Follow instructions from campus security and use the nearest safe exit.

exitGuide.nearestExitText: Nearest exit will be suggested automatically.

bottomCards.title: Safety Protocols
bottomCards.description: Know what to do in fire, medical, and personal safety situations.

bottomCards.title: Exit Navigation
bottomCards.description: Find the nearest exit and view status in real time.
